title: 104_s2017
content: There is no information provided in the prev_chunk to assist with summarizing the curr_chunk. The Secretary of Agriculture will convey National Forest System lands to Public Utility District No. 1 of Chelan County, Washington in exchange for lands owned by the Public Utility District. The National Forest System lands are 122 acres partially occupied by a wastewater treatment facility. The Secretary of Agriculture will convey National Forest System lands to Public Utility District No. 1 of Chelan County, Washington in exchange for 109.15 acres of land owned by the Public Utility District. The legal description of the land includes various sections in Chelan County, Washington. The Public Utility District will exchange 109.15 acres of land in Chelan County, Washington with the Secretary of Agriculture. The legal description includes specific sections in the county. Upon acceptance of the title by the Secretary, the District will receive all rights to the lands described. The Secretary will conduct appraisals of lands for exchange, excluding the value of a wastewater treatment facility. If one party's land is valued lower, additional consideration may be required for the exchange. As part of an exchange, the Secretary will convey a wastewater treatment facility to the Public Utility District of Chelan County, Washington, in exchange for lands of lesser value. The Public Utility District must provide a credit equal to the value of the facility for the exchange to occur. The Public Utility District must provide a credit equal to the fair market value of the wastewater treatment facility for the exchange to occur. The Secretary may require additional terms and conditions to protect the interests of the United States.
